page.title: 03CHILDREN'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: Some of the school pupils were asked how they spend their weekends and these are some of the replies. "I normally go runs on my bike which is a 5 speed racer. Sometimes, early on Saturday mornings, I go fishing. On Saturday afternoons I often go to the Flamingo which is an amusement arcade down town. If it's wet I stay in and play computer games or watch a video. Last Sunday I saw 'Night of the Demons' which is about a group of campers attacked by a hairy monster." "My mum and me often go shopping. Last weekend she bought me new trainers, an Adidas cagoul and bleached jeans. On Saturday night I do my homework and punishment exercises for school." " On Saturdays me and my boyfriend go down town to look at records. Our favourite singers are U2 and Paul Young. At night we go to the cinema."
